The '''Watatsumi Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]], themed after [[Watatsumi Island]].

The shared ability bonus of this series is '''Watatsumi Wavewalker''':
{{Description|For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by '''0.12-0.24%'''. A maximum of '''40-80%''' increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.}}

Additionally all weapons of this series also share the same '''main attribute,''' ATK, but with different values.
